summary:
Adds a new companion for you, and guess what race?
Exactly, a werewolf!
descriptionHtml:
Welcome, I love to introduce you to Mongo the Werewolf. He's a very nice person and he thinks he is a female khajiit. If you're looking for another creature to be your follower, just contact me or write a comment! :)
This is my first little mod and I'm just discovering the world of a modder. I know its simple, but i think its a lot of fun having a werewolf as a companion with you on your adventure. He is a little bit bigger than a normal werewolf and he is quite Strong.

He's waiting for you at the entrance of Whiterun where you can ask him to be your companion.
I'm working on this mod and i think i'm adding a Quest linked to him. For advices and questions just contact me on Skyrimnexus. I have always an ear for advices.
author: sneaker
